mini: MOD Kitchen Equipment Pvt. Ltd., known as MOD, is a leading provider of complete commercial kitchen and catering equipment solutions. Based in New Delhi, India, MOD specializes in turnkey kitchen projects, serving various industries.
text:
MOD Kitchen Equipment Pvt. Ltd., known as MOD, is a leading provider of complete commercial kitchen and catering equipment solutions. Based in New Delhi, India, MOD specializes in turnkey kitchen projects, serving various industries.
 MOD is a trusted supplier of bakery and catering equipment to internationally acclaimed hotels, bakeries, coffee outlets, restaurants, educational institutions, and industrial units across the country. With a focus on quality and functionality, MOD delivers top-notch products and services to meet the diverse needs of its clients.
 MOD is a major sales and service provider in India for OZTI, a renowned commercial kitchen equipment brand from Turkey. With a ready stock of spare parts, MOD ensures prompt support for customer requirements.
 With expertise in manufacturing and importing commercial kitchen equipment, MOD's design team meticulously plans and designs layouts to optimize space utilization and facilitate smooth operations. 
MOD Kitchen Equipment Pvt. Ltd. is dedicated to customer satisfaction and has earned a reputation for excellence. Their commitment to delivering high-quality products, reliable services, and innovative solutions has made them a trusted name in the industry.
MOD's expertise, strong industry relationships, and customer-centric approach position them as a reliable one-stop solution for all commercial kitchen and catering equipment needs.

mini: With 27 years of industry experience, RANS Technocrats is a renowned Indian company specializing in the manufacturing of kitchen equipment for the foodservice industry. Their commitment to advanced technology has made them a trusted choice for hotels and restaurants throughout India.
text:
With 27 years of industry experience, RANS Technocrats is a renowned Indian company specializing in the manufacturing of kitchen equipment for the foodservice industry. Their commitment to advanced technology and innovative products has made them a trusted choice for hotels and restaurants throughout India.
RANS Technocrats serves customers nationwide, providing dedicated service and support. They pride themselves on their state-of-the-art machinery and a strong emphasis on quality, ensuring that their equipment meets international standards.
To offer a comprehensive range of kitchen equipment, RANS Technocrats has developed specialized brands. ULTIMATE, one of their brands, offers a wide selection of baking ovens, salamanders, and pizza ovens. ICEDEN, another brand, focuses on commercial refrigeration equipment such as display counters, deep freezers, under-counter refrigerators, and freezers.
GRATEINOX, their specialized brand, specializes in high-quality stainless steel kitchen floor gratings. Leveraging their expertise in sheet metal fabrication, RANS Technocrats also offers a diverse range of customized commercial kitchen equipment under the RANS brand.
As a leading manufacturer in India, RANS Technocrats is recognized for their commitment to delivering high-quality products and excellent service to customers nationwide.

mini: Valrhona, the iconic French chocolate manufacturer renowned for its craftsmanship and innovation, has captivated chocolate lovers worldwide since 1922. With an unwavering commitment to excellence, B Corp certified,
text: Valrhona, the iconic French chocolate manufacturer renowned for its craftsmanship and innovation, has captivated chocolate lovers worldwide since 1922. With an unwavering commitment to excellence, B Corp certified, Valrhona meticulously sources the finest cocoa beans globally, partnering with select plantations with long term partnership to ensure sustainability and ethical practices. The result is an exquisite range of chocolate varieties, each boasting unique flavor profile, intensity, and origin. Valrhona chocolates are highly coveted by top pastry chefs, bakers, and chocolatiers for their exceptional taste, texture, and versatility. Euro Foods Pvt Ltd, a leading distributor in India, proudly offers Valrhona's distinguished chocolates to esteemed clientele, including 5-star hotels, retail chains, caterers, bakeries, and more. With Euro Foods' commitment to delivering premium quality products, Valrhona chocolate enthusiasts in India can indulge in the sublime taste and elevate their culinary creations to unparalleled heights.

mini: IBCA is one of the topmost learning centre in the capital of India as an impeccable platform to nurture future professionals in this artistic field of Bakery and Culinary Arts.
text: IBCA has become an excellent platform for newbies to learn and master the field of Bakery and Culinary Arts in their sophisticated courses. All courses have a standard curriculum to give students guidance in various methods, processes, preparations, and building recipes from scratch. We turn newcomers with little or no experience in Bakery and Culinary Arts into dedicated professionals ready to compete in the demanding world of building their careers. IBCA offers them all the resources they need to advance their amateur careers while receiving professional guidance. Over the years, IBCA has earned one of the top names as bakery institute in Delhi & culinary institute in Delhi. Last few years, people have joined our bakery classes in India from different parts of the world and states of India, establishing us as a prestigious bakery & Culinary Institute in India. All these joinings happened based on our student performance on the International level and our placement records across the world.
